text:
Thank you for your hard work, Producer-san.
Here's the key back.

You've been working late.
You've really put in a lot of effort in your self-practice.

Yes...
Today, both Hiori-chan and Meguru-chan had work.
So I had some extra time to put in the effort...

I see... I can sense a
fulfilling atmosphere from you, Mano...

Howa... Yes,
lately, both work and lessons have been so enjoyable...

Haha, that's probably because you've been believing
in yourself and putting in the effort, Mano.

Oh, um... If I'm able to work hard,
it's all thanks to the people who believed in me...

You're humble, Mano.
Yeah... that's one of your charms.

But also...
I want you to acknowledge yourself, Mano.
Because you've surely been doing that.

Producer-san... I feel like I'm starting to understand
the importance of believing in myself now.

From now on,
I'll try to believe in myself a little more.
